chunks.zh: 这个年真难啊，被催婚“成功”把父母、亲戚朋友都得罪一边
chunks.en: This year is really tough, being 'successfully' pressured into marriage has offended my parents, relatives, and friends.

chunks.zh: 你得罪亲戚了？你越强则越容易被“原谅”。爷强则姑亲，父强则叔亲，母强则舅亲，子强则侄亲，自强则全亲，不强则无亲。
chunks.en: Did you offend your relatives? The stronger you are, the more easily you will be 'forgiven.' If grandpa is strong, the aunt is close; if the father is strong, the uncle is close; if the mother is strong, the maternal uncle is close; if the son is strong, the nephew is close; if you are strong yourself, all relatives are close; if you are not strong, you have no relatives.

chunks.zh: 不用太在意，早晚都要得罪的。人生很长，只要不听他们的话，不受他们控制，任何一件事都会得罪他们，早晚的事，每个人都一样。
chunks.en: Don't worry too much, you'll offend them sooner or later. Life is long, as long as you don't listen to them, and aren't controlled by them, anything you do will offend them. It's just a matter of time, and it's the same for everyone.

chunks.zh: 得罪就得罪呗，你又不是和他们结婚
chunks.en: So what if you offend them? You're not marrying them.

chunks.zh: 越早得罪你会越早过的好
chunks.en: The sooner you offend them, the sooner you'll have a good life.

chunks.zh: 同意楼上的话，你有自己想法的话，迟早得把周围的人都得罪一遍，打破那些父母一辈残留下来的东西，直到建立起新的你觉得舒服合适的社交距离。我有个朋友，家里有钱，一辈子没谈过恋爱，前年找了个一看就跟他不合适的网络模特闪婚，去年四月分居，今年大年初一晚上找我诉苦说离婚了。被女方爆了一半的金币，还觉得是因为俩人没缘分。
chunks.en: Agree with the person above, if you have your own ideas, you'll have to offend everyone around you sooner or later, break the things left over from your parents' generation, until you establish a new social distance that you feel comfortable with. I have a friend whose family is rich, and he never dated his entire life. The year before last, he found a net model who was obviously unsuitable for him and had a flash marriage. They separated last April, and this year on the first night of the Lunar New Year, he came to me to complain about the divorce. He had half of his money taken by the woman, and still thinks it's because they weren't meant to be.

chunks.zh: @asd7160 一看就是刚毕业的小屁孩，女孩子手都没摸过，正是被大奶迷惑的年纪，读点书吧，靠多巴胺支撑的激情最多只能维持 18 个月，揉个一年半就发现还是揉面团舒服😌
chunks.en: @asd7160 You can tell he's just a recent graduate, hasn't even held a girl's hand, and is at the age where he's fascinated by big boobs. Read some books, the passion supported by dopamine can only last up to 18 months. After kneading for a year and a half, you'll find that kneading dough is more comfortable😌

chunks.zh: 告诉他们，橘子不是唯一的水果，每个人都有自己的活法。
chunks.en: Tell them that oranges aren't the only fruit and everyone has their own way of living.

chunks.zh: @chengchengya 因为做到了有史以来全家族学历最高阅历最丰富社会层次最高，我的地位无可撼动哈哈哈，没人有资格对我提出任何意见和建议，就可以想什么时候结婚就什么时候结婚了。
chunks.en: @chengchengya Because I have achieved the highest education, the richest experience, and the highest social level in the entire family history, my position is unshakable hahaha, no one is qualified to offer me any opinions or suggestions, so I can get married whenever I want.

chunks.zh: 没懂，为什么被催婚成功了，反而还把大家得罪了？不是应该得到祝福吗？
chunks.en: I don't get it, why did being successfully pressured into marriage end up offending everyone? Shouldn't it be a blessing?

chunks.zh: 我自己大学谈的师妹，谈了 7 年多才摆酒结婚。
chunks.en: I married my junior schoolmate from university after dating for more than 7 years.

chunks.zh: 我认为催婚就是父母毫无信仰的表现。将子女的婚育作为自己的人生目标。
chunks.en: I think that being pressured into marriage is a sign that parents have no faith. They make their children's marriage and childbirth their own life goals.

chunks.zh: @liuzimin 成功前面少了个逗号
chunks.en: @liuzimin There's a missing comma before '成功' (success)

chunks.zh: 还是很羡慕能被催婚的，说明家里有可以结婚的资本。
chunks.en: I'm still envious of those who are pressured into marriage, it means their family has the capital to get married.

chunks.zh: 为啥那么抵触呢？你就没有欲望吗？你不想摸大奶吗……？
chunks.en: Why are you so resistant? Don't you have desires? Don't you want to touch big boobs...?

chunks.zh: 找几个福利姬和捞女新闻给爹妈看，就说催得急着急随便找找出有历史遗留问题的，要么就是爆父母金币的，问他们能接受不。光动嘴说谁不会
chunks.en: Find some news about 'welfare girls' and gold diggers to show your parents, and say that if they rush you, you might just find someone with historical problems, or someone who will drain their bank account, and ask them if they can accept that. Anyone can just talk.

chunks.zh: @asd7160 好像不需要负责一样。
chunks.en: @asd7160 Sounds like there's no need to take responsibility.

chunks.zh: @liuzimin 我觉得还好吧，程序员收入大多数都还好。负起家庭责任，换来天天能揉大奶我觉得挺好的。当然不是随便着急乱找一个，肯定要好好找合适的人好的啊
chunks.en: @liuzimin I think it's okay, most programmers have good incomes. Taking on family responsibilities in exchange for being able to knead big boobs every day sounds pretty good to me. Of course, it's not about rushing into finding someone random, you definitely need to find the right person.

chunks.zh: 发两次疯就没人催了
chunks.en: Go crazy twice and no one will pressure you anymore.

chunks.zh: 你倒是说点细节啊，这大过年的也没事干，爱听你唠
chunks.en: Why don’t you share some details? We have nothing to do during the New Year. We love to hear you chat.

chunks.zh: @Takizawa 怎么抗住催婚的 完全按照彼此的节奏来
chunks.en: @Takizawa How to resist the pressure of marriage urging? Just follow each other's rhythm.
